name: SurfNow
0:
”Alexa, ask Surf Now what's the surf report in Venice?”
”Alexa, ask Surf Now how's the surf in Malibu?”
”Alexa, ask Surf Now to get the surf report in El Porto.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: surf now
des:
Surf Now tells you the surf report for the surf spot of your choice right at that moment. Surf Now's report contains the surf rating out of 5 stars, the minimum and maximum wave height, and wind speed and direction.

Currently only locations in Los Angeles are supported, but we are rapidly adding more spots!

Surf Now is powered by Magicseaweed (magicseaweed.com) data.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
